pkgmetadata.longdescription: HTML with Horizontal Strips Symbolizing Events in a Person's Life // Produce an HTML page containing horizontal strips that symbolize events in a person's lsife. Since this is entirely a visualization, the image https://barryzee.github.io/henry- timeline/henry.html will show the basic use to show a timeline of events. The image https://barryzee.github.io/vermeer/cssOverlay.html shows how to correlate two timelines of events. A brief description is available at https://barryzee.github.io/timeLineGraphics_manusc ript/golden_age.html.
